text: Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, nop suk agek apek agɨnɨgab, Tap yɨp kod mɨdtep ma gɨpan ak, yɨp agñel nepin agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak nad am tap yad tɨtay mɨdeb okok ñɨn pag nɨgtep gɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop tap day yad tɨtay mɨdeb okok ñɨn pag nɨgtep gɨl, ap yɨp agñɨnɨmɨn agɨnɨgab agak. Pen wog yɨp ak kɨdek ma gɨnɨgaban agɨnɨgab agak.
